election_record.label: New York 1807 Governor

overview.note: The official canvass of votes lists 31,301 votes for Morgan Lewis in New York state, though the district totals add up to 31,300.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 26, lists 1721 votes for Morgan Lewis in Albany county.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 26, lists 337 votes for Morgan Lewis in Albany city.

sub_unit.name: Two
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as D. D. Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Three
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.
The New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 6, and the New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 4, and the American Citizen (New York, NY), May 5, list 91 votes for Morgan Lewis in Ward 3 of Albany.
The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 48 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins and 74 votes for Morgan Lewis in Ward 3 of Albany.
The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY), May 18, lists 91 votes for Morgan Lewis in Ward 3 of Albany.

sub_unit.name: Four
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 14 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins and 92 votes for Morgan Lewis in Ward 4 of Albany.

sub_unit.name: Bethlehem
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Duanesburgh
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists no votes for Morgan Lewis in Duanesburgh.

sub_unit.name: Clinton
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Champlain
sub_unit.note: "Forty votes for Mr. Tompkins, taken in the town of Champlain, Clinton County, were set aside by reason of mis-spelling--the return being made for-two instead of forty-two." The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 22 and June 12. The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), June 16 and The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 12, reflect this, listing 2 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Champlain.

sub_unit.name: Chateaugay
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 31 votes for Morgan Lewis in Chateaugay.

sub_unit.name: Essex
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 2 votes as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Salisbury
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 14, lists 8 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Salisbury.

sub_unit.name: Rensselaer
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 7, lists 1542 votes for Morgan Lewis in Rensselaer county.

sub_unit.name: Greenbush
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 202 votes for Morgan Lewis in Greenbush.

sub_unit.name: Petersburgh
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 76 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Petersburgh.

sub_unit.name: Philipstown
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 7; The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), May 8; and the Northern Budget, May 5, list 168 votes for Morgan Lewis in Philipstown.

sub_unit.name: Schodack
sub_unit.note: The Northern Budget, May 5, and The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), May 8, list no votes from Schodack.

sub_unit.name: Saratoga
sub_unit.note: Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Clorgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Milton
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 135 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Milton.
The American Citizen (New York, NY), May 26, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 26, list 150 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Milton.

sub_unit.name: Northfield
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 195 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Northfield.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 2 votes as Daniel Tompkins and 1 vote as Daniel D.D. Tompkins.
Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Morgan Lew.

sub_unit.name: Middle
sub_unit.note: The official canvass of votes lists 7459 votes for Morgan Lewis in the Middle District, though the county totals listed here add up to 7458.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: The official canvass of votes lists 1513 votes for Morgan Lewis in Columbia county, though the town totals listed here add up to 1512.
John Loudon received 1 vote as John Louder.

sub_unit.name: Chatham
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), May 9, lists 143 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Chatham.

sub_unit.name: Claverack
sub_unit.note: The official canvass of votes lists 148 votes for Morgan Lewis in Claverack.

sub_unit.name: Granger
sub_unit.note: All newspaper sources for Columbia county list 70 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins and 78 votes for Morgan Lewis in Granger.

sub_unit.name: Beekman
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tomkins.

sub_unit.name: Northeast
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Wallkill
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 19, lists 108 votes for Morgan Lewis in Wallkill.

sub_unit.name: Ulster
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 19; the New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 16; and the New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 15, list 827 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Ulster.

sub_unit.name: Hurley
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 19; the New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 16; and the New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 15, list 73 votes for Morgan Lewis in Hurley.

sub_unit.name: Mamacatting
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 19; the New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 16; and the New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 15, list 95 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins and 36 votes for Morgan Lewis in Mamacatting.

sub_unit.name: New York
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins and 1 vote as Judge Tompkins.

The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 12, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 19, list 1672 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in New York county.

sub_unit.name: Six
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 202 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Ward 6.

sub_unit.name: Eight
sub_unit.note: The New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 6, and the New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 2, list 118 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Ward 6.

sub_unit.name: Nine
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 84 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Ward 9.

sub_unit.name: Queens
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 743 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Queens county, though the town totals listed add up to 773.

sub_unit.name: Oyster Bay
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 19, lists 165 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Oyster Bay.

sub_unit.name: Brookhaven
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 19, list 186 votes for Morgan Lewis in Brookhaven county.

sub_unit.name: Riverhead
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), May 14, lists 147 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Riverhead.

sub_unit.name: New Castle
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 19, lists 28 votes for Morgan Lewis in New Castle.

sub_unit.name: Angelica
sub_unit.note: Angelica was the only town in Allegany County in 1807.

sub_unit.name: Cayuga
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 1329 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Cayuga county, though the town totals listed add up to 1339.

sub_unit.name: Brutus
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.
Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Morgan Louis.

sub_unit.name: Chenango
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Greene
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 83 votes for Morgan Lewis in Greene.

sub_unit.name: Preston
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 16, the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 2, and the American Citizen (New York, NY), May 30, list 39 votes for Morgan Lewis in Preston.

sub_unit.name: Sherburne
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 2, the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 2, and the American Citizen (New York, NY), May 30, list 166 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Sherburne.

sub_unit.name: Herkimer
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins and 1 vote as Daniel D.F. Tompkins.

The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 19; New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 23; Columbian Gazette, May 12; New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 20; and American Citizen (New York, NY), May 18, list 635 votes for Morgan Lewis in Herkimer county.

sub_unit.name: Herkimer
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), May 19; New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 23; Columbian Gazette, May 12; New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), May 20; and American Citizen (New York, NY), May 18, list 90 votes for Morgan Lewis in the town of Herkimer.

sub_unit.name: Russia
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 19; New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 23; Columbian Gazette, May 12; and American Citizen (New York, NY), May 18, list 92 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Russia.

sub_unit.name: Henderson
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 12, lists 35 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Henderson.

sub_unit.name: Hounsfield
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY), June 9, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), Juen 12, list 8 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Hounsfield.

sub_unit.name: Rutland
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY), June 9, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 12, list 40 votes for Morgan Lewis in Rutland.

sub_unit.name: Oneida
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 1 vote as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Onondaga
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 2 votes as Daniel Tompkins, 1 vote as Daniel B. Tompkins and 1 vote as Daniel P. Tompkins.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 22, list 1090 votes for Morgan Lewis in Onondaga county.

The American Citizen (New York, NY), May 29, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 2, list 1340 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Onondaga county, though the town votes listed add up to the total listed here.
The American Citizen (New York, NY), May 29, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 2, list 1094 votes for Morgan Lewis in Onondaga county.
The New-York Herald (New York, NY), May 23, lists 1053 votes for Morgan Lewis in Onondaga county.

sub_unit.name: Cincinnatus
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY), May 29, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 2, list 38 votes for Morgan Lewis in Cincinnatus.

sub_unit.name: Fabius
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 22, list 72 votes for Morgan Lewis in Fabius.

sub_unit.name: Ontario
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 2 votes as Daniel Tompkins.
The official canvass of votes lists 7 votes for Philetus Swift in Ontario County, though the original town returns list only 1 vote.

sub_unit.name: Hartford
sub_unit.note: "The votes taken in the town of Hartford, in this county [Ontario] were rejected, it appearing that the poll of the election had been kept open four days." Abany Register, May 22 and June 12, 1807.

sub_unit.name: Otsego
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 2 votes as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Plainfield
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 65 votes for Morgan Lewis in Plainfield.

sub_unit.name: Saint Lawrence
sub_unit.note: The Columbian Gazette, May 19, and the American Citizen (New York, NY), May 21 and 26, list 145 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Saint Lawrence county.
The American Citizen (New York, NY), June 9, and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 12, list 319 votes for Morgan Lewis in Saint Lawrence county.

sub_unit.name: De Kalb
sub_unit.note: The Columbian Gazette, May 19, lists 1 vote for Daniel D. Tompkins in De Kalb.

sub_unit.name: Oswegatchie
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY), June 9,and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), June 12, list 17 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Oswegatchie.

sub_unit.name: Schoharie
sub_unit.note: Daniel D. Tompkins received 2 votes as Daniel Tompkins.

sub_unit.name: Middleburgh
sub_unit.note: "The votes taken in the town of Middleburgh in Schoharie County were rejected, the inspectors not having mentioned in their certificate any office that they were given for." The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 22 and June 12 , 1807.

sub_unit.name: Tioga
sub_unit.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 153 votes for Daniel D. Tompkins in Tioga county, though the town totals listed add up to 154.
